thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com | 6 of 141
thread.title: Aleks

author: Aleks
title: Aleks
text: Great quality product. A set of labels for my daughter has lasted me a couple years of preschool due to fantastic quality. When ordering for my son, I just wish custom options were available with the fun graphic backgrounds as well versus being plain if I had chosen my own colors. I was disappointed with that aspect. Overall, I think though the price is high, the product is worth it.
